name: OpenSSL CLI
short_description: OpenSSL is the most widely used Crypto engine for PKI-based security ... but with a complicated command line syntax. OpenSSL CLI is a 100% GnuPG syntax compatible Command-Line for exploiting all the Crypto features of OpenSSL.
